sources.full: Gods of the Dawn of War

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zehir can innately cast the following spell, her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 26}):

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: When Zehir drops to 0 hit points or dies, her body is destroyed but her essence travels back to her domain in the Towers of Night, and she is unable to take physical form for a time.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Zehir fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless she wishes to be affected, Zehir is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Zehir's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Zehir regains 30 hit points at the start of her turn.

trait.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action, the Zehir can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The Zehir doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the Zehir is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The Zehir knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the Zehir that starts its turn within 20 feet of the Zehir must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw, unless the Zehir is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the Zehir's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Zehir can use her Divine Presence. She then makes three attacks: two with her bite and one with her tail.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Divine Presence
entries: Each creature within 120 ft of Zehir must make a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they have disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws made against Zehir and in addition they cannot gain advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, or saving throws against Zehir. These effects end when they stay out of range of this effect for more than 10 minutes. On a successful save, they are immune to this effect for the next hour. If they fail the saving throw by 10 or more, attack rolls that are less than a 20 on the {@dice d20} automatically miss, dealing no damage. Saving throws and ability checks that are less than a 20 on the {@dice d20} automatically fail. A creature can repeat their save at the end of each of their turns.

legendary.name: Divine Regeneration
entries: Zehir regains 50 hit points.

legendary.name: Serpentine's Ferocity
entries: Zehir makes one bite attack and one tail attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Zehir moves up to half its movement without provoking attacks of opportunity.

legendary.name: Eternal Darkness
entries: Zehir casts maddening darkness, centered on itself. This darkness covers the entirety of Zehir's domain if she is in it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Lolth's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 26}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self} (can become a Medium female Drow when changing her appearance)

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: When Lolth drops to 0 hit points or dies, her body is destroyed but her essence travels back to her domain in the Abyss, and she is unable to take physical form for a time.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Lolth fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless she wishes to be affected, Lolth is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Lolth's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Noxious Webs
entries: A creature that starts its turn in a space flled with or {@condition restrained} by webbing created by Lolth (either by her Web attack or her spell) takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: If Lolth has at least 1 hit point, she regains 30 hit points at the start of her turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Lolth can climb difcult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, Lolth knows the exact location of any creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: Lolth ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lolth uses her Divine Presence and Web, she then makes four attacks: one with her bite, one with her whip, and two with her Impaling Forelegs.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, unless it is immune to poison damage. Otherwise, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failed save. While {@condition poisoned}, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) poison damage at the end of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Pain Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and the target has disadvantage to attack rolls and saving throw rolls until the end of Lolth's next turn. In addition, the target must succeed on a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward Lolth.

action.name: Impaling Foreleg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). While {@condition grappled}, the target is {@condition restrained}, takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage at the start of each of Lolth's turns, and Lolth can't use one of her Impaling Legs on another target.

action.name: Web
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 15} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one Huge or smaller creature. {@h}The creature is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 22} Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 15, 20 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to acid, poison, and psychic damage.

action.name: Divine Presence
entries: Each creature within 120 ft of Lolth must make a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they have disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws made against Lolth and in addition they cannot gain advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, or saving throws against Lolth. These effects end when they stay out of range of this effect for more than 10 minutes. On a successful save, they are immune to this effect for the next hour. If they fail the saving throw by 10 or more, attack rolls that are less than a 20 on the {@dice d20} automatically miss, dealing no damage. Saving throws and ability checks that are less than a 20 on the {@dice d20} automatically fail. A creature can repeat their save at the end of each of their turns.

legendary.name: Insidious Poison
entries: Lolth chooses one creature within 30 feet that she has {@condition poisoned}. The target must make a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature uses its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against a creature of Lolth's choice that Lolth can see.

legendary.name: Web
entries: Lolth uses Web.

legendary.name: Web Crawl
entries: While on webbed surfaces, Lolth moves up to half her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Whip (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Lolth makes an Pain Whip attack.

legendary.name: Impale (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Lolth uses her Impaling Foreleg attack.

legendary.name: Summon Handmaiden (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Lolth magically summons a yochlol. The yochlol appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Lolth and acts as Lolth's ally. The yochlol remain until Lolth dies or until she dismisses it as an action.
